RECORD.TEXT: 625739584 PUOMC 794008 12/9/2002 12:00:00 AM Discharge Summary Signed Signed NAME : URKE , AMA L 499-91-11 12/09/2002 DISCHARGE DATE : 12/11/2002 PRINCIPAL DIAGNOSIS : OPERATIONS / PROCEDURES : Re-do left craniotomy for tumor resection . HISTORY : The patient is a 48-year-old female with a history of astrocytoma who presented with a history of astrocytoma , who underwent craniotomy in 1993 . The surgery was followed by XRT and chemotherapy with vincristine and Temodar . Biopsy confirmed foci of astrocytoma . She was treated with XRT and PCV chemotherapy . In April 2000 , the patient underwent a left occipital craniotomy for tumor . Imaging studies revealed a new lesion for which the patient was taken back to the operating room . Medical history is as above . 1. Decadron 4 mg b.i.d. 3. Zantac 150 mg q.d. 4. Multivitamins . ALLERGIES : PHYSICAL EXAMINATION : Patient is awake , alert , oriented x 3 . Cranial nerves intact . Tandem gait is unsteady . Heel-to-shin unsteady ; finger-to-nose was intact . Strength was 5/5 . Sensory was intact . HOSPITAL COURSE : For details , please see the operative report . Postoperatively , she had a right hemianopsia and an expressive aphasia . She was , otherwise , neurologically intact . She had a moderate expressive aphasia which was slightly worse than preoperatively . Postoperatively , she was watched in the ICU and transferred to the floor on postoperative day one . She worked with physical therapy and occupational therapy . She will follow up with Dr. Kohmedlfreiermbeem in the brain tumor clinic . She will call Dr. Celkkaysqian 's office for a follow-up appointment . A AH nurse will also visit her at home as well as home PT . WERN NEIGHELKS , M.D. DICTATING FOR : Electronically Signed LUPEVICKETTE L LIST , M.D. 01/09/2003 16:56 _____________________________ LUPEVICKETTE L LIST , M.D. rmk DD : 12/11/2002 12/12/2002 8:42 A 794008 LUPEVICKETTE L LIST , M.D.
